abstract: Coty’s $10 billion unsolicited bid for Avon Products didn’t come out of the blue. The two companies had held talks for several months beforehand — with Avon in the position of buyer.
snippet: Coty’s $10 billion unsolicited bid for Avon Products didn’t come out of the blue. The two companies had held talks for several months beforehand — with Avon in the position of buyer.
lead_paragraph: 3:48 p.m. | Updated with comments from Coty’s chairman

headline.main: Coty’s Bid for Avon Came After Talks Did Not Result in Deal

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
